text: Just because he says that now doesn’t mean he’ll stick to his word during a divorce.  Divorce brings out the worst in people.  And honestly, your husband sounds a little manipulative and immature.  He may just want to punish you or make your life harder if you try and divorce him.  He may try and take the kids from you.  It happens all the time.  Please protect yourself and your kids. Document all of his abuse and infidelity. It’ll pay off in the end!
